abstract: Human Rights Advisory Panel issues scathing report on United Nations peacekeeping mission in Kosovo; panel, part of UN Interim Administration Mission in territory, says UN has failed to hold mission accountable for human rights violations, particularly for failing to investigate disappearances, killings and mass lead poisonings of displaced Roma at UN camps.
lead_paragraph: The panel said its effort to make the United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo accountable for rights violations had been a “total failure.”

headline.main: United Nations Assailed in Report by Kosovo Rights Panel
headline.print_headline: Human Rights Panel Assails U.N. Mission’s Accountability in Kosovo

snippet: The panel said its effort to make the United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo accountable for rights violations had been a “total failure.”...

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
